pageContext.claim: “Well, I don't know him [George Conway]. Yeah, I don't know him. He's a whack job, there's no question about it. But I really don't know him. He -- I think he's doing a tremendous disservice to a wonderful wife. Kellyanne is a wonderful woman. And I call him ‘Mr. Kellyanne.’”
pageContext.analysis: Trump claims not to know George Conway, an influential Republican lawyer, former Trump Tower resident and husband to one of the president's top advisers, Kellyanne Conway. But George Conway said in an interview with The Post that he has had a number of notable interactions with Trump over the past decade, often concerning legal representation and sensitive legal matters since Trump became president.
